desc:3826831049: The cooldown of Intimidation is reduced by {1} sec.
desc:3344945565: Your Harpoon spell throws a Grappling Hook rather than your current weapon.
desc:1245170144: Your Dire Beast often calls forth dire versions of your stabled pets.
desc:785455506: Multi-Shot deals {1}% increased damage and Explosive Shot deals {2}% increased damage.
desc:1884126352: Bestial Wrath calls on the pack, summoning a pet from your stable for {1} sec.
desc:129613522: Death Chakram now resembles the Necrolord Covenant Ability.
desc:733221470: Bloodshed's pet damage bonus increased by {1}% and Kill Command deals {2}% increased damage to the target.
desc:3588579939: Vicious Hunt and Pack Coordination now stack and apply twice, and are always active during Call of the Wild.
desc:573559076: The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by {1} sec and Coordinated Assault now grants {2} stacks of Tip of the Spear.
desc:1363060509:
While Trueshot is active, you surrender to darkness, granting you Deathblow.

Casting Black Arrow while under the effects of Withering Fire causes you to additionally fire a barrage of {1} additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at {2}% effectiveness.
desc:1126841605: Kill Command prepares you to viciously attack in coordination with your pet, dealing an additional {1} Physical damage with your next Kill Command.
desc:1868423452: Barrage now instead shoots Rapid Fires at your target and up to {1} nearby enemies at {2}% effectiveness, but its cooldown is increased by {3} sec.
desc:3648400388: Targets you damage below {1}% health gain a stack of Sentinel every {2} sec.
desc:753576430: Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to {1} enemies within {2} yds.
desc:3994835128:
Kill Command's chance to grant Deathblow is increased by {1}% and Deathblow now makes Kill Shot strike up to {2} additional targets.

Your chance to gain Deathblow is doubled during Coordinated Assault.

|T132208:24|t {ffffffff|Deathblow}
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
desc:2692008781: Aspect of the Turtle, Survival of the Fittest, and Mend Pet heal the target for {1}% of maximum health over {2} sec. Duration increased by {3} sec when healing a target under {4}% maximum health.
desc:3934585077:
When a target affected by Sentinel deals damage to you, they are rooted for {1} sec.

May only occur every {2} min per target.
desc:249442738: For {1} sec after activating Coordinated Assault, all abilities are guaranteed to apply Sentinel.
desc:1431867111: You now shoot a stellar flare highlighting the target location.
desc:4208380362: Your Dire Beast ability calls on bees!! DIRE BEES!!!
desc:3547816656: Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing {1} Arcane damage to up to {2} targets within {3} yds of your Sentinel targets.
desc:631588176:
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to {1}% chance to generate {2} Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
desc:3875979435: The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by {1}%.
desc:1507386447: Casting Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Intimidation and Binding Shot by {1} sec.
desc:3371286820: While in combat, Disengage will chain the closest target to the ground, causing them to move {1}% slower until they move {2} yards away.
desc:1397862062:
Your attacks have a chance to apply Sentinel on the target, stacking up to {1} times.

While Sentinel stacks are higher than {2}, applying Sentinel has a chance to trigger an implosion, causing a stack to be consumed on the target every sec to deal {3} Arcane damage.
desc:1907316231:
Kill Shot applies Serpent Sting for {1} sec.

|T1033905:24|t {ffffffff|Serpent Sting}
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take {2} Nature damage instantly and an additional {3} Nature damage over {4} sec.

Serpent Sting's damage applies Latent Poison to the target, stacking up to {5} times. Barbed Shot consumes all stacks of Latent Poison, dealing {6} Nature damage to the target per stack consumed.
desc:1332396144:
Every {1} sec your next Rapid Fire launches a celestial arrow that conjures a {2} yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing {3} Arcane damage.
 
For the next {4} sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for {5} Arcane damage every {6} sec. Any target struck by this effect takes {7}% increased damage from you and your pet for {8} sec.
desc:3421519599: Attacking with Vicious Hunt instructs your pet to strike with their Basic Attack along side your next Barbed Shot.
desc:4261726962: Disengage increases the range of all your attacks by {1} yds for {2} sec.
desc:1358584783: Your spells and attacks deal {1}% increased damage and ignore line of sight against any target in your Volley.
desc:2956873395: Each damage over time effect on a target increases the damage they receive from your pet's attacks by {1}%.
desc:3512744282:
When Misdirection targets your pet, it reduces the damage they take by {1}% for {2} sec.

The cooldown of Misdirection is reduced by {3} sec.
desc:625546551:
When a trap triggers, you gain {1}% movement speed for {2} sec.

Can only occur every {3} min.
desc:3358288505: Tranquilizing Shot removes up to {1} additional Magic effect from up to {2} nearby targets.
desc:2131185819: If Tranquilizing Shot removes only an Enrage effect, its cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
desc:81099061: Each time Black Arrow deals damage, you have a small chance to manifest a Dark Hound to charge to your target and deal Shadow damage to nearby targets for {1} sec.
desc:688747787: Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to {1}% of your maximum health, up to {2}%.
desc:4125531726: Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal {1}% increased damage.
desc:940748545: Slightly reduces the size of your pet.
desc:1431800729: You heal for {1}% of all Shadow damage dealt by you or your pets.
desc:3464993673:
You take {1}% reduced damage while Camouflage is active.

This effect persists for {2} sec after you leave Camouflage.
desc:2305160851: When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply {1} additional stack.
desc:1308509235: Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing {1} Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit {2}. Trap will exist for {3} min.
desc:3791866974: Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.
desc:1145002965: Gain critical strike damage equal to {1}% of your critical strike chance.
desc:857725741: Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by {1} sec, up to {2} sec.
desc:736913479: When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by {1}% for {2} sec.
desc:1550145770: Wildfire Bomb reduces the cooldown of Butchery by {1} sec.
desc:3777746852: Each damage over time effect on a target increases the critical strike damage they receive from you by {1}%.
name:643327474: Glyph of the Goblin Anti-Grav Flare
desc:1437532038: Exchange your flares with Goblin Anti-Grav Flares! They almost work, and at least they don't explode.
desc:701339022: Butchery increases the damage of your next Butchery by {1}%.
desc:2068814503: Your Dire Beast ability often calls for beasts victimized by the famed hunter.
desc:3829078904:
Wildfire Bomb deals {1}% increased damage and has a {2}% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by {3} sec.
desc:1130074393: Your pet's Basic Attack has a {1}% chance to reset the cooldown and cause Kill Command to strike a second time for {2}% of normal damage.
desc:2465050505: Your Harpoon spell throws a Trident rather than your current weapon.
desc:1054402636: Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to {1}% of your critical strike chance.
desc:1869055421: Your pet's Basic Attack critical strikes increase your critical strike damage by {1}% for {2} sec stacking up to {3} times.
desc:2570580395: Binding Shot's stun duration is increased by {1} sec.
desc:1465632098: Your auto shot has a {1}% chance to also fire a Cobra Shot at your target.
desc:3171030035: Casting Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by {1} sec.
desc:2028989807: Casting Black Arrow while Trick Shots is active causes Black Arrow to explode upon hitting its target, dealing {1} Shadow damage to other nearby enemies.
desc:547541994: When Aimed Shot deals damage, {1}% of the damage dealt is replicated to each other unit affected by Black Arrow.
desc:4131067215: Steady Shot reduces the cooldown of Aimed Shot by {1} seconds.
desc:739665784:
Casting Cobra Shot increases its damage by {1}%. Stacks up to {2} times.

Upon reaching {3} stacks, the bonus is removed and you gain {4}% increased pet damage for {5} sec.
desc:838262050: While in combat, Disengage releases a fan of shadow daggers, dealing {1} Shadow damage per second and reducing affected target's movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:3803243735: Casting Explosive Shot causes all active pets to Stomp at {1}% effectiveness.
